What does the colour of your urine say about your health
description: Your urine's colour offers vital health clues, from pale yellow indicating good hydration to darker shades suggesting dehydration. Her involvement surfaced after a colleague's arrest and the recovery of an assault rifle from her car. The module, targeting students and doctors, was dismantled through arrests across multiple locations.

title: When four wheels become weapons: Delhi’s 1st suicide car bombing exposes new threat — why cops should worry
description: Delhi faces its first Suicide Vehicle-Borne Improvised Explosive Device (SVBIED) attack, a deadly tactic where vehicle parts become lethal projectiles.  These blasts are hard to prevent due to civilian vehicle camouflage and bomber commitment.  Intelligence, public vigilance, and physical barriers are crucial for future prevention.

title: Who is Cedric Irving Jr? Oakland police name suspect as Laney College mourns John Beam
description: Oakland police identified Cedric Irving Jr. as the suspect in the fatal shooting of Laney College football coach John Beam. The incident occurred Thursday at the campus fieldhouse, leading to a lockdown. Irving Jr. was arrested Friday morning while armed, following an overnight search. The motive for the shooting remains under investigation.

title: Was WhistlinDiesel arrested? Reported tax-evasion leak sparks online buzz
description: Popular YouTuber Cody Shane Detwiler, also known as WhistlinDiesel, faced arrest on November 13, 2025. Reports indicate tax evasion charges in Williamson County, Tennessee. A substantial bond was set. Detwiler himself confirmed the arrest via social media. This news has sparked widespread online discussion among his followers and the wider internet community.

title: Gabrielle Union shares emotional birthday tribute for sister Tracy
description: Gabrielle Union recently celebrated her sister Tracy's birthday with a touching Instagram post featuring cherished childhood photos. The heartwarming tribute, which also saw tributes from Dwyane Wade and daughter Kaavia James, has captivated fans. This follows Union's equally emotional birthday message for Kaavia, highlighting the actress's deep family connections.

title: Zuckerberg's charity insight: Researchers demanding GPUs; reject space and staff
description: Mark Zuckerberg and Priscilla Chan's philanthropic organisation, CZI, is now prioritising computing power, specifically GPUs, over physical expansion for its science and AI mission.  Researchers at Biohub are demanding more GPUs, which Chan describes as 'new lab space' that is more expensive than traditional facilities. This strategic shift aims to accelerate breakthroughs in AI-powered biology.

title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight vs Hornets? Latest Bucks injury update
description: Giannis Antetokounmpo is probable to play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets after resting the previous game due to left knee patellar tendinopathy. The persistent condition requires careful load management, but his recent dominant performance highlights his continued impact. His return is crucial for the Bucks, who are also dealing with other roster injuries.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America’s largest carmaker sets deadline
description: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.
